name: Treasure Hunter 2D
description:
Treasure Hunter 2D is a game for those who like a lot of blood and action-packed experiences. Join us on a fantastic experience through the famous castle town, but watch out! Dangers are everywhere. Beware of lava puddles, nails, bows, large swinging iron balls, saws and more. Are you ready? Are you the one who will find the hidden treasure?

Move MovementWASDkeyJumpSpacekey Interact Open DoorEnterkeyDialouge NextSpace/Enterkey Credits

- Philip Åkerblom
